definitions: a person or machine that gathers crops as a harvest

examples.text: back-breaking labor as hired sugar beet harvesters
the world's first mechanical harvester of grapes

shortDefinitions: person or machinen that gathers crops as harvest

definitions: a person who catches or kills animals for human consumption

examples.text: coastal fish harvesters are always the first to notice the decline of fish stocks

shortDefinitions: person who catches or kills animals for human consumption

definitions: a person or organization that collects or obtains a resource for future use

examples.text: one of the world's biggest harvesters of the sun's energy

shortDefinitions: person or organization that collects or obtains resource for future use
